about_the_game:
"From forging destiny to battling for survival – welcome to the forest that shapes heroes."

About the Game: Weapons are not just tools – they are an extension of your soul. In Emberblade, you play as a young boy who leaves his blacksmith village in search of a place where he truly belongs. The forest is perilous but filled with opportunities. Use the materials you gather to craft deadly melee and ranged weapons, tailoring your strategy with every run.

Amulets – Your greatest allies (or worst enemies). The forest holds more than wood and stone. Discover powerful amulets that grant unique abilities and synergies. Use them wisely – each amulet can turn the tide of battle or bring you closer to ruin.

Key Features:

Dynamic rogue-lite gameplay: Every adventure brings new challenges, enemies, and strategies.

Customizable combat: Craft and experiment with melee and ranged weapons to discover your perfect playstyle.

Unique amulets: Find and combine dozens of amulets with distinct effects and powerful synergies.

Stunning pixel art world: A vibrant retro-style environment that brings the magical forest to life.

short_description: Emberblade is a fast-paced pixel art rogue-lite following a young blacksmith boy venturing into a mystical forest. Armed with crafted melee and ranged weapons, he battles with enchated amulets. Forge, fight, and adapt as you shape your own story in a mystical forest.
